Agendas.name: Requirements - R2R
Agendas.subject: R2R Requirements Gathering
Agendas.body:
Hi Team,

Please join for a review of the R2R requirements.

Meeting Objective

Ensure we are on track with Data Migration activities.

Meeting Agenda

Review Data Migration Status & Upcoming Deliverables

Review Data Migration Strategy Document as needed

Discuss relevant Data Migration Templates

Thanks,

Joe
